title: 7.3 Master Challenge 3
question:
Reflect on your experience of collaborating with your friends on any project.
● What was the nature of the project, and what challenges were presented by the project’s scope or team size?
● Which collaboration tool(s) did you use, and why were they chosen?
● How did these tools help your team coordinate tasks, manage code or document changes, and maintain communication?
● Were there any difficulties or limitations encountered while using these tools? How did your team overcome these challenges?
● What features of these tools would you like to see improved or added to facilitate software development projects in the future better?
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
